jd: From: Arun, GAC Solutions Inc arun@gacsol.com Reply to: arun@gacsol.com Hi Professionals, This is Arun from GAC solutions Inc. I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent requirement your prompt response is appreciated Agile Project manager Chicago Heights, ILContract H1B Consultants Only – Locals Preferred.Rate: $ 50.00/hr on C2C Job Description:- Planning and coordinating Agile projects from initiation to completion- Facilitating Agile ceremonies and promoting continuous improvement- Removing impediments and ensuring team productivity and efficiency- Managing project budgets, timelines, and resources- Communicating project progress and status to stakeholders- Assisting the team in achieving a high level of performance and quality- Holding teams responsible for their job and mentoring less experienced team members- Organizing and leading project status and working meetings- Preparing and distributing progress reports- Managing risks and issues and correcting deviations from plans- Working within cross-functional teams and ensuring each increment of functionality is potentially shippable?
